data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Th, Zoi N., Lekkou, D., Koutsogi, Terini, St, D., Voulg, N., Piperk, Sios, Ch, Terini, Ts, Ntonios E. (2018): New records and updated checklist of Cicadomorpha (Hemiptera: Auchenorrhyncha) species from Greece. Zootaxa 4413 (1): 133-157, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4413.1.4|3 occurrences
